summary: Replaces the Bard song 'Age Of Aggression' with Malukah's version, to all the Bards of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
What is BardSongsBetter ?
This mod is an attempt to replace the dull and bland vanilla version of Bard Songs by the various available Skyrim Covers done by different artists. Better singing as well as better lip synch is the main goal of this MOD.


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Songs replaced till now ??

1) Age of Aggression - Cover by Malukah (both Male & Female)
Download : BardSongsBetter v1.0
Listen to Malukah's Cover at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KNDT7EInclo

FAQ : NO the Male Bards will not sing in female voice. The Male bards will have a Male voice and will be singing Malukah's Cover. However female bards will be using Malukah's voice as it is.


----------------------------



2) Ragnar the Red - This one is not available on Nexus even. I believe it is the first time someone has done a MOD for this song.
Download : BardSongsBetter-Ragnar

Female : Cover by Sabrina Valenzuela
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6rZQvbiiOOI

Male : Skyrim metal cover by Edoardo Morelli
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wdUW-9JJlCo


------------------------


3) Dragonborn Comes by Edoardo Morelli
Download : BardSongsBetter-Dragonborn

Cover available at:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RKQYbIXq94s


-----------------------------

4) Dragonborn Comes by Malukah (both male & female)
Download : BSB-Dragonborn Comes (Malukah)

Check video.
This will replace the song for both male and female Bards however as the video suggests the male version is as much Manly as the female version is Malukah.

FAQ : Before you ask, NO it is not compatible with the Edoardo's version in item 3 above.
If someone wants both to be merged in one I can do that, but for that the person needs to write in and ask nicely :D
For some reason I liked Malukah's male version more


--------------------------

5) Age of Oppression by Malukah (both Male and Female)
Download : BSB-Age of Oppression (Malukah)

NOTE : Please AVOID using this along with BardSongsBetter v1.0, item 1 above, as both together are not compatible. I will write an update shortly to correct that. :P


----------------



6) Age of Aggression & Oppression (2 in 1) by Malukah.
Download : BSB-Aggression Oppression (Malukah) in optional section.

NOTE : This MOD includes an updated version of BardSongsBetter, item 1 above, for the song Age of Aggression. So its wise to use this one instead. Also it is much much better :)



--------------


STILL TO COME :

Tale of Tongues - Malukah (both male & female)



# If you like the MODS here please endorse and if you dont like kindly comment what you dislike or what more is needed. Send in your feedback in either case. I need Data Data Data, cant make wall without Bricks...!!

:P

# Please feel free to suggest any other ideas.





Enjoy..!!




-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Check my other MOD BardSongsOverhall
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54384/?

NOTE :- For best results please use with FSS - No pause between lines by FuzzySockSucker
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6333/?


:)

Thanks enjoy...!!
author: rex007king
